scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit && npm run check-built-assets
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:styles && npm run test:lint:js && npm run test:lint:i18n
scripts.check-built-assets: { git status resources/lib/ | grep "nothing to commit, working tree clean"; } && { echo 'CHECKING BUILD SOURCES ARE COMMITTED' && npm run build && git status resources/lib/ | grep "nothing to commit, working tree clean" || { npm run node-debug; false; }; }
scripts.node-debug: node -v && npm -v && echo 'ERROR: Please ensure that production assets have been built with `npm run build` and commited, and that you are using the correct version of Node/NPM.'
